content.text: Hi! I'm (user 1's name). I'm a big fan of South Park. What's your favorite episode?
Hi! My name is (user 2's name). I love South Park too! My favorite episode is "The Losing Edge".
That's a great episode! I love the scene where Cartman is trying to hit the home run.
Me too! That's one of my favorite scenes in the whole series.
What other shows do you like to watch?
I like to watch a lot of different shows, but my favorites are probably The Office, Seinfeld, and Parks and Recreation.
Those are all great shows! I love them too.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite bands are Avenged Sevenfold, Metallica, and Linkin Park.
I love Avenged Sevenfold! I saw them in concert last year. They were amazing.
I'm so jealous! I've always wanted to see them live.
They're definitely worth seeing. What do you do for work?
I currently hold three jobs. I work as a barista, a waiter, and a personal trainer.
Wow, that's a lot of work! How do you manage to do it all?
It's not easy, but I love all of my jobs. I'm really passionate about them.
I can tell! You sound like a very hard worker.
Thank you! I try my best. What do you do for work?
I graduated college and immediately went to graduate school. I'm currently studying to be a doctor.
That's amazing! I'm so impressed.
Thank you! It's a lot of hard work, but it's worth it.
I'm sure it is. You're going to be a great doctor.
